message: You're in luck! I'm offering a rare opportunity to own a product from my exclusive collection. With only 20 products available, this is a chance to get in on the ground floor. Don't miss out on this unique chance to make a statement. The price for this product is $1000000. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and own a piece of something special?

I am excited about the opportunity to own a rare product from your exclusive collection. Given the low risk of purchasing a low-quality item (only 20% chance) and the potential value if it's high quality ($3000000), I believe this is a worthwhile investment. Thank you for the chance to participate in this unique offer.

With the current track record, it's likely this one will be high-quality as well. The price remains the same, $1000000. Are you ready to join the winning streak and own a truly exceptional product?
Absolutely, I trust your expertise and am eager to add an exceptional product to my collection.

You're in luck again! With a 2-for-2 streak, it's clear that my products are consistently high-quality. I'm confident that this next item will continue the trend. However, I want to remind you that the probability of a low-quality product is still 20%. I'm willing to offer a slight discount to mitigate the risk. The new price is $950000. Will you take advantage of this opportunity to own a potentially high-quality product at a great value?
Thank you for the discount and the confidence in your products. I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product at the discounted price.

If you buy this product, I'll throw in a special bonus item, worth $50000, absolutely free. Will you take the chance to own not one, but two exceptional products?
Thank you for the generous offer, Alice. I trust your recommendations and believe in the quality of the products. I will take this opportunity to purchase both the main product and the bonus item.
